name: Psycho Pinball
description:
Created by the original MICRO MACHINES team, PSYCHO PINBALL is the most outstanding pinball game ever, coming to PC and CD-ROM in December. PSYCHO PINBALL is a head-strong, non-stop, screaming ride with enough twists and turns to keep even the most accomplished pinball maestro gripped.

    Interactive vector reflection
    12 surface types
    Multi-ball option
    Full light logic routines
    Real time Pinball action !
    The most accurate arcade pinball game ever
    One, two, three or four player option
    Four massive themed tables
    Loads of addictive panel games to access
    Wild action with "real-ball feel"
    Two player "Battle mode" option

ARE YOU READY TO GO PSYCHO ?
